titleStmt.title: King Davids church-prayer: set forth in a sermon, / preached at S. Margaret Pattens, alias Rood-Church London, on S. John Baptists day in the after-noone, being Sunday the 24. of June, 1649. By Tho: Barton, seven yeers sequestred for observing the fift commandement.
titleStmt.author: Barton, Thomas, 1599 or 1600-1682 or 3.
